textAfterTable: 8 Songs Customer Reviews What a stunning album!           by Prema Lucas Damian Erskine is my favourite bassist, so it's no surprise that I am passionate about his work! 'So To Speak' is nothing short of inspiring; the tracks are incredibly uplifting and leave the listener elevated.
